meanings.definition: The state of being undamaged or whole.
meanings.sent1: The intactness of the ancient artifact amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The intactness of the glass after the fall surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: Despite the rough journey, the cake arrived with its intactness intact.
meanings.sent4: The intactness of her heart after the breakup was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent5: The intactness of the puzzle pieces made completing it much easier.

meanings.definition: The quality of being complete or unimpaired.
meanings.sent1: The intactness of the team's strategy led them to victory.
meanings.sent2: The intactness of the plan ensured its success.
meanings.sent3: The intactness of the joke's punchline made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The intactness of the friendship weathered many storms.
meanings.sent5: The intactness of the document's seal proved its authenticity.
